snippet: A nephew of former Mayor Richard M. Daley of Chicago was indicted on Monday in the death of a man in a fight outside a Chicago bar in 2004.
abstract: Richard J Vanecko, nephew of former Mayor Richard M Daley of Chicago, is indicted in   death of David Koschman, who struck his head after falling in a fight outside a Chicago bar in 2004; he faces involuntary manslaughter charges.
lead_paragraph: A nephew of former Mayor Richard M. Daley of Chicago was indicted on Monday in the death of a man in a fight outside a Chicago bar in 2004.

headline.seo: Nephew of Former Chicago Mayor Is Indicted
headline.main: Illinois: Nephew of Former Chicago Mayor Is Indicted
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Nephew of Former Chicago Mayor Is Indicted
